text: André Gattolin (born 24 June 1960) is a French ecologist politician and Senator for Hauts-de-Seine. ==Biography== Born on 24 June 1960, he studied at Sciences-Po Paris and University of Paris III: Sorbonne Nouvelle. From 1996, he becomes marketing director of the French newspaper Libération. Since 2006, he has been teaching Communication Sciences at University of Paris III: Sorbonne Nouvelle. ==Political career== ===Electoral mandates=== * Senator of Hauts-de-Seine : Elected in 2011, re-elected in 2017. ====Senatorial functions==== * Vice-chair of the European Affairs Committee (since 2014) * Member of the Culture Committee (since 2017) * Vice-chair of the Finance Committee (2014-2017) === Political functions === * Federal secretary of the Transnational Radical Party (1989) * Délégué national adjoint of Europe Ecology – The Greens (2009-2011) ==References== ==External links== * Official website * André Gattolin on senat.fr Category:1960 births Category:Europe Ecology – The Greens politicians Category:French ecologists Category:Living people Category:People from Bourgoin-Jallieu Category:Sciences Po alumni Category:French Senators of the Fifth Republic Category:University of Paris alumni Category:University of Paris faculty Category:La République En Marche! politicians Category:Senators of Hauts-de-Seine Category:Politicians from Île- de-France
